page.title: 15Tavistock -St.Peter's School
page.content: St.Peter's Junior School was opened in{1976}having space for{250 children. This year there are 150 children:they come from all over Tavistock and surrounding villages. This is a{church school}linked with the parish church of St.Eustachius.It is built of pre-cast concrete and stone,with many large window areas. There are{7 class-bases}spread around three sides of a central courtyard. Along the fourth side is the hall where we have assemblies,P.E. and eat our dinners,cooked in the kitchen. There are reference and fiction libraries.Outdoors we have playgrounds and playing fields,with a nature trail,also a{swimming pool}and changing rooms. 6 main teachers teach all subjects. We can go to{clubs}for { Sports, Dancing, Music, Art & Craft, {Drama,French, and Science.}
